description: The best userbot made by @lucifeermorningstar. Made with Love And Phone And Hardwork and... Nhi aur kahi se to nhi bana....For Support Join @DevilUserBot

ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable heroku.

API_ID_KEY.description: Fill your Full name. By default it is DevilUserBot User

API_ID_HASH.description: Set Custom Alive Message When entering .hell Command.

STRING_SESSION.description: Put here any telegraph media link for alive pic in .hell command.

RAW_SIBYL.description: Put Your Telegram Bio Here Required For Auto Bio.

RAW_ENFORCERS.description: put here any telegraph media link for custom pmpermit pic.

INSPECTORS.description: Enter Your custom pm permit msg.

ENFORCERS.description: Put an Group Id Same As PRIVATE_GROUP_ID Required For Pmpermit plugin.

MONGO_DB_URL.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Putting Others Value may result In Account Ban.

Sibyl_logs.description: Required for Removing image background. Get your api key from https://www.remove.bg/

Sibyl_approved_logs.description: Register an account on ocr.space to get this value(API key)....

GBAN_MSG_LOGS.description: Needed for Lydia AI. Follow https://telegra.ph/Lydia-09-05 to get your API.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Putting Others Value May result In Account Ban.

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API.Required for updater to work.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top.Required for updater to work.

TZ.description: Required for Correct Time for autopic get from http://www.timezoneconverter.com/cgi-bin/findzone.tzc
